theme: आत्मा और ज्ञान पृथक है लेकिन स्थल विशेष में उसको ज्ञान कहा गया है क्योंकि वो इसका श्रेष्ठ गुण है - विज्ञानं यज्ञं तनुते  (तैत्तिरीयो. २-५) जैसे ब्रह्म को स्थल विशेष में आनंद कहा जाता है क्योंकि वो उसका श्रेष्ठ गुण है

terms.तद्गुणसारत्वात्: tada guna sāratvāt: due to the essential nature of that (Brahman) being composed of gunas (qualities),
terms.तद्व्यपदेशः: tada vyapadeśaḥ: its designation (name) is given,
terms.प्राज्ञवत्: prājñavat: like (the designation of) a wise person.

meaning: Meaning:This verse explains that although Brahman is beyond any qualities or designations, it is given a name or designation for the purpose of understanding and communication. Just as a wise person may be known by their qualities, Brahman is designated with names based on its essential nature being composed of gunas (qualities). However, it should be noted that Brahman is ultimately beyond all attributes and cannot be fully described or defined by any name or quality.
